publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4307 Ted Brocklebank: Congratulations to the University of St Andrews—That the Parliament congratulates the University of St Andrews on maintaining its position as the best university in Scotland, as shown in The Times Good University Guide 2010; notes that St Andrews has moved up from fifth to fourth best university in the United Kingdom and is the only Scottish university in the top 10; pays tribute to the academic staff at St Andrews for the high quality of their teaching, and looks forward to even greater success under the leadership of the newly-appointed Principal, Dr Louise Richardson.

S3M-4307 Ted Brocklebank: Congratulations to the University of St Andrews—That the Parliament congratulates the University of St Andrews on maintaining its position as the best university in Scotland, as shown in The Times Good University Guide 2010; notes that St Andrews has moved up from fifth to fourth best university in the United Kingdom and is the only Scottish university in the top 10; pays tribute to the academic staff at St Andrews for the high quality of their teaching, and looks forward to even greater success under the leadership of the newly-appointed Principal, Dr Louise Richardson. Supported by: Jamie McGrigor*, Jackson Carlaw*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Margaret Mitchell*
S3M-4307 Congratulations to the University of St Andrews (lodged on 3 June 2009) Bill Aitken*, Murdo Fraser*, Mary Scanlon*
S3M-4307 Congratulations to the University of St Andrews (lodged on 3 June 2009) Robin Harper*
S3M-4307 Congratulations to the University of St Andrews (lodged on 3 June 2009) Tom McCabe*
